name: Sportful Neo Shorts - Men's
description: Excellent value in shorts with a long list of features. 6 beautifully engineered panels are stitched together with flat-locking seams to make this a smooth choice for riding or spinning. The layered chamois is shaped and offer support, with good moisture transfer and fast dry time.Made from soft Elast-X compression fabric to help prevent muscle fatigue6-panel construction.Comfort Pro multi-density chamois provides comfortable support without lots of bulk.Airy inseam fabric.Partial jacquard elastic with silicone grip dots.Flat-lock stitching on selected seams.
